extension.summary: Europæiske radiostationer, som streamer live på nettet
Europäische Radiostationen, die live im Internet streamen
Ευρωπαϊκοί ραδιοφωνικοί σταθμοί που εκπέμπουν ζωντανά στο διαδίκτυο
European radio stations streaming live on the internet
Le stazioni radio Europee in streaming dal vivo su internet
Internet live streams van Europese radio stations
Europejskie stacje radiowe na żywo w internecie
Estações de rádio europeias com transmissão ao vivo na internet
Estações de rádio europeias ao vivo por transmissão online
Európske rádio stanice naživo stramujúce na internete
Europeiska radiostationer som sänder direkt över internet
extension.description: Velkommen til listenlive.eu, en webradio-oversigt med over 4000 radiostationer fra overalt i Europe, som streamer live på nettet.
Listenlive.eu ist ein Web-Radio Aggregator mit mehr als 4000 Radiostationen aus Europa.
Καλώς ήρθατε στο listenlive.eu, ένα ευρετήριο διαδικτυακών ραδιοφωνικών σταθμών με περισσότερους από 4000 σταθμούς που εκπέμπουν ζωντανά στο διαδίκτυο σε όλη την Ευρώπη.
Welcome to listenlive.eu, a web radio directory showcasing over 4000 radio stations from across Europe streaming live on the internet.
A listenlive.eu több mint 4000 élo rádióadást tartalmaz Európából, melyeket az interneten keresztül érhetsz el.
Benvenuto a listenlive.eu una web radio che mostra più di 4000 radio stazioni provenienti da tutta Europa in diretta streaming su internet.
Welkom bij listenlive.eu, een web radio directory met meer dan 4000 radio stations uit heel europa welke live streamen op het internet.
Witamy w listenlive.eu, katalogu ponad 4000 stacji radiowych z całej Europy nadających na żywo w internecie.
Benvindo a listenlive.eu, um directório de rádios web que oferece mais de 4000 estações de rádio de toda a Europa com transmissão ao vivo na internet.
Bem-vindo à listenlive.eu, um diretório de rádio na web que contém mais de 4000 estações de rádio de toda a Europa ao vivo pela internet.
Vitajte na listenlive.eu, web stránke, ktorá prezentuje vyše 4000 rádio staníc z celej Európy streamujúcich naživo na internete.
Välkommen till listenlive.eu, en webbradiokatalog med över 4000 radiostationer från över hela Europa som sänder direkt över internet.

extension.summary: Put all your favourites bits of all your favourites addons into one easy to use addon.
extension.description: Super Favourites is a better way of managing your Kodi Favourites.[CR][CR]Virtually any menu item within Kodi can be added to Super Favourites, even from addons that don't normally provide this feature.[CR][CR]Super Favourites allows you to better manage your Kodi favourites, including the creation of sub-folders, into which your Kodi favourites can then be copied or moved into.[CR][CR]This allows you to create you own custom addon with just the best bits of your favourite addons. Search your favourite addons, play your favourite music, read your favourite comic strips, select your favourite playlists, browse your favourite movies, listen to your favourite radio stations, watch your favourite cartoons, the possibilities are endless, all from within one easy to use addon.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

[I]הדור החדש[/I][CR][CR][B]Covenant סרטים וסדרות[/B][CR][CR]ההרחבה הזו אינה חלק של Kodi Media Center. אנא אל תבקש עזרה עם ההרחבה זה מכל אחד מערוצי התמיכה הרשמיים של Kodi [CR][CR]. אין למחבר תוכן בהרחבה הזו והמחבר אינו אחראי לתוכן שנמצא.

Autor ovog dodatka ne posjeduje bilo kakav sadržaj koji je pronađen i nije povezan sa bilo kojim izvorom sadržaja. Ovaj dodatak samo pretražuje sadržaj na web stranicama. Koristite ga na vlastitu odgovornost!
מחבר ההרחבה זה אינו מארח את התוכן שיתכן ויימצא ואין לו זיקה לאף אחד מספקי התוכן. הרחבה רק מחפשת תוכן שקיים באתרי אינטרנט. השימוש בהרחבה הוא על אחריותך בלבד!

extension.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com and a lot more. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions. Uses MetalliQ for playback and library functions.

Dit script biedt meerdere mogelijkheden om online content weer te geven in skins en bevat ook een complete MovieDB browser inclusief info dialogen voor verscheidene media types. Gebruikte diensten zijn themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com en nog veel meer. Vereist skin implementatie voor de meeste functies. Gebruikt MetalliQ voor afspeel en bibliotheek functies.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: PyXBMCt is a mini-framework for simple XBMC addon UI buliding. It is similar to PyQt and provides parent windows, a number of UI controls (widgets) and a grid layout manager to place controls.

This service checks your addon folder for possibly unauthorized, potentially harmful repositories and informs the user about these. Detailed informations are logged into the caretaker.log at the same folder as your kodi.log. Repository providers: If you think your repository is mistakenly blacklisted, please inform the vendor of this addon.

Dieser Dienst überprüft den Addon-Ordner auf möglicherweise nicht autorisierte, potentiell schädliche Repositories und informiert den Nutzer darüber. Detaillierte Informationen werden im caretaker.log protokolliert, welche sich im Log-Verzeichnis von Kodi befindet. Repository Provider: Sollte Euer Repository fälschlicherweise auf der Blacklist erscheinen, informiert bitte den Anbieter dieses Addons.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, June 2007

extension.summary: Skin based on the Fire TV UI
extension.description: Fork of Hitcher's fTV skin with nearly full PVR functionality, plus changed a lot of behaviours and added dozens of other features[CR][CR]Skin description: Provides the look and feel of the Fire TV user interface.[CR]For the complete experience enable 'TV Show wide icons' and either use Artwork Downloader to grab logos or create your own artwork and add it to the database (see forum for more details).
